ajeffrey.teaching.http.client.logic

Interface Logic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LogicImpl

    public interface Logic
    The business logic for a simple HTTP client.
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Alan Jeffrey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static LogicFactory factory
      A factory for building new business logic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void get(java.lang.String url)
      Get a URL and print the contents out to the output stream.
      void setPrintWriter(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Set the output stream for the business logic to print to.
      void stop()
      Stop getting a URL.

    • Field Detail

      • factory

        static final LogicFactory factory
        A factory for building new business logic.

    • Method Detail

      • setPrintWriter

        void setPrintWriter(java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Set the output stream for the business logic to print to.
        Parameters:
        out - the new output stream

      • get

        void get(java.lang.String url)
        Get a URL and print the contents out to the output stream. If the URL is malformed, or the contents cannot be fetched, an error is printed to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to fetch

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop getting a URL. This will stop the fetch of the URL. It is safe to call this even if there is no get running at the moment.
